prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a playful goat with leafy features.
I want a Pokemon that embodies nature and agility, with a focus on grassy landscapes.
Generate a cute, quadruped creature with a mix of green and brown colors.
Make a Pokemon that has a friendly personality and loves to frolic in the fields.
Imagine a small, grass-type Pokemon that is perfect for a starter team in the wild.
Design a Pokemon that has distinctive hoofed feet and a vibrant, green mane.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a playful demeanor.
